InnovativeWeb

History

My name is Shaun Russell and I’m an aspiring front-end web developer located in Tulsa, Oklahoma. Although I currently work as a full-time chemical lab technician, I took an interest in developing the user interface of websites two years ago starting with raw HTML, CSS and vanilla JavaScript. Since then, I have been able to build upon that knowledge using modern concepts and the latest technologies in order to efficiently create websites that are fully responsive, optimized, accessible and cross-browser compatible.

Credentials

To validate this understanding, I completed teamtreehouse’s TechDegree program specifically designed to test skills in front-end web technologies and became the first student to graduate.

Goals

My focus on creating a seamless user experience has brought me from viewing this passion as a hobby to aspiring towards a career where I can apply these skills while continuing to keep up with the latest developments. Although my ultimate goal is to become a full stack developer, I am currently seeking a position for a company or an agency that needs help in the following areas.

About this Website

The design and layout of this website was built using Adobe Photoshop.

The CSS has been written in Sass with a mobile first approach and has included breakpoints that allow a visually compelling layout at any screen size.

The website has been optimized for speed and is cross-browser compatible.
